channel.title: tuna on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in tuna on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: FD Seared Tuna
item.description: 326 calories 168g tuna steak, seared in a hot griddle pan - no oil, use a squeeze of lemon if needed Serve with 120g [whole] grilled small red pepper 100g sliced, grilled, courgette Which have been cut into long strips and mixed in a bowl with a teaspoon of olive oil Grill on a medium-high heat for 5 minutes each side. Dress with a sqeeze of lemon.
